title: Weak-Willed
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||[[Willpower]]-||You are vulnerable to hostile enchantments.
|-
|2||Willpower--||You are highly vulnerable to hostile enchantments.
|-
|3||Willpower---||You are extremely vulnerable to the effects of hostile enchantments.
|- style="font-style:italic;"

[[Bad_mutations|Bad mutation]]

==History==
*Prior to [[0.26]], all sources of willpower was called Magic Resistance.
